modName: Gunzle's Skill - Perktree leveling - God Mode mod.
summary: 100% Creation Club friendly! This mod advances your perk tree skill levels by 5,000+ making you stronger in each skill. Updated; Gunzle's Skill Leveling mod includes undo file that allows you to lower the value's as well.
descriptionHtml:
[b][u][center][b][u][i][b][u][i][color=#00ff00][size=4]100% Creation Club friendly! 
Keep playing as a bad a$$ without losing your achievement earning ability.[/size][/color][/i]
[/u][/b]
[color=#00ffff]Saying "THANKS FOR THE FREE STUFF" is easy,[/color]
[color=#00ffff]just click on the Endorse button [/color][/i]
[/u][/b][/center][/u][/b][size=4][center][color=#ff0000]
ENDORSE [/color][color=#ffff00]ENDORSE [/color][color=#0000ff]ENDORSE [/color][color=#00ff00]ENDORSE[/color][/center]
[/size][b][i][size=4][color=#00ffff]This mod is also included in my mod "[/color][url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/70769][color=#6d9eeb]Rock Me Gunzle[/color][/url][color=#00ffff]", I highly recommend using it rather than this mod because it offers so much more. The [url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/70769]Rock Me Gunzle[/url] mod gives you shouts and dragon souls to unlock them with, more gold than you will use in the game, a bunch of ingredients, spell tomes and armor, it shows all map markers in game (you still have to discover the place to fast travel to it) and more. I have not tested these together so please do not use both at the same time or you risk overpowering.[/color][/size][/i]

[color=#ff7700]This will advance your skill level by more than 5 thousand in each perk tree making you stronger in each skill (see images for the before and after shots). Those skills are [/color][color=#00ffff]destruction, restoration, alteration, enchanting, smithing, heavy armor, blocking, two handed, one handed, archery, light armor, sneak, lockpicking, pickpocket, speech craft, alchemy, illusion and conjuration.[/color][color=#ff7700] This will not advance you up the tree nor add perk points but it will make you a stronger player in all skill sets. The skills will reflect the rise in their respective level, an example, by raising the enchanting level by more than 5 thousand you will find that [/color][color=#00ffff]your items will be enchanted with much stronger abilities, your archery will be deadlier, your sneak will be sneakier, etc..[/color][color=#ff7700] I use the option when I start a new game, I do that often enough that I became tired of typing this at the start of each new game so I put it all into a simple bat executable file, I am sharing because I am sure I am not the only one who would use this.[/color][/b]

[size=2]Once downloaded you'll need to unzip the folder then copy the text files to your Skyrim Data folder [i][color=#00ff00][u][b](Typically found in C:Program Files\Steam\SteamApps\common\Skyrim\Data) [/b][/u][/color][/i]to complete the installation, do not copy the Read Me file to the data folder.
[/size]
While in game simply use the Tilde key ~ to bring up the console commands ability then type "[color=#00ff00]bat gunzlesperks[/color]" and press the enter key. Note; do not include the quotation marks " ".
 
The undo file lets you lower your skills back like they were before, to activate it  use the Tilde key ~ to bring up the console commands and type "[color=#ffff00]bat undogunzlesperks[/color]" and press enter. Note; do not include the quotation marks " ". 

[size=2] [/size][size=2][b][u][i][color=#e06666]Caution[/color][/i][/u][/b][color=#f4cccc]; These can be done more than once but there is a risk of overpowering (or underpowering using the undo command) thus defeating the purpose of adding this mod and could result in unwanted game behavior.
[/color]

[color=#f4f4f4]Remember to say "Thanks for the free stuff" by clicking the ENDORSE button on all mods you use.[/color][/size]
author: Gunzle

files.name: Gunzles Perk Skills Complete - Undo now included with this file.
